dict.acceptation: 读( read的现在分词)；看懂；理解；显示，标明；

sent.orig: There are two types of reading. One is reading aloud. The other is silent reading.
sent.trans: 有两种读书方式，一种是大声读，另一种是默读。

sent.orig: Good reading habit and proper reading method are key to successful reading.
sent.trans: 良好的阅读习惯、正确的阅读方法是阅读取得成功的关键和手段。

sent.orig: Both intensive reading and extensive reading help develop your reading comprehension.
sent.trans: 精读和泛读都有助于增强阅读能力。

sent.orig: In this sense, every reading is an allegory of reading and every reading is a misreading.
sent.trans: 在此意义上，每一次阅读都成为一个阅读的寓言，每一次阅读都是误读。

sent.orig: At some point, I gradually moved out of reading these other things into reading science fiction.
sent.trans: 渐渐地，我从这些书过渡到了科幻小说。
